short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a download button for videos, images, and GIFs on threads.net.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Effortlessly download videos, images, and GIFs from threads.net with just one click! The "Threads Video, Image, GIF Downloader" Chrome extension adds a convenient download button directly on the media content you want to save, making it easy to collect and store your favorite moments from threads.net.

Features:
One-Click Download: Instantly download images, videos, and GIFs with a simple click on the download button.
Seamless Integration: The download button is automatically added to all supported media on threads.net, blending perfectly with the website's design.
Excludes Profile Pictures: Smart filtering ensures that the download button doesn't appear on profile pictures, keeping the focus on the content that matters.
Lightweight & Fast: Designed to be efficient, the extension operates without slowing down your browsing experience.

How to Use:
Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Browse threads.net as usual.
When you see an image, video, or GIF you'd like to download, simply click the "Download" button that appears on it.
The media will be saved directly to your device.
Save the content you love from threads.net with ease and convenience. Download the "Threads Video, Image, GIF Downloader" now and start collecting your favorite moments!
